column1: learned High Court Judge has come to a wrong conclusion by wrongly
analyzing the evidence of the case.

A
ccordingly, I set aside the Judgment dated 09.08.2018, the conviction,
and  the  death  sentence  passed  on  the  2nd  accused-appellant.  The
appellant is acquitted of the charge of murder.

J
   
UDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
